content:
RT @danilop: Testing a new #serverless multi-region architecture using some #AWS #reInvent announcements:

Global Accelerator -> ALB -> Lambda -> DynamoDB on-demand global tables

Bonus:
- you get two anycast IPs to point your DNS to
- SSL/TLS certificates for HTTPS are free with ACM :) https://t.co/g0gZHCfUBI
